tachyon.worker

Class WorkerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.WorkerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class WorkerClient
extends Object
implements Closeable
    The client talks to a worker server. It keeps sending keep alive message to the worker server. Since WorkerService.Client is not thread safe, this class has to guarantee thread safety.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkerClient(MasterClient masterClient, ExecutorService executorService, TachyonConf conf, ClientMetrics clientMetrics)
      Create a WorkerClient, with a given MasterClient.
